definition: كدس kadasa i (kads) and II to pile up, heap up, accumulate, amass (هـ s.th.); to cram together, press together, compress (هـ s.th.) V to be heaped up, be piled up; to pile up, accumulate (intr.); to press together, get crammed up كدس kuds pl. اكداس akdās heap, pile; stack (of grain, hay, etc.)
